website_summaries.verdict: A premium floorstanding speaker with enhanced bass and greater dynamics than most options.
pros: Bass frequencies have a greater presence due to two built-in cone woofers
Equalization offers a good balance of low and high frequencies for better results when playing music and other media
cons: Mid-range frequencies of the speaker suffer compared to the low and high end of the spectrum

customer_reviews.title: Can't be beat for the price!!!
customer_reviews.text: At the time I purchased these speakers they were for $177 for the pair . For that price you just can't beat the quality of the speakers and sound of these speakers. From the great highs and mids what impressed me the most was how much bass these speakers were giving out. Enough that I actually had to turn off my main subwoofer (klipsch)as it was good enough for me. The dimensions are just perfect for my needs not too tall not too wide. Would HIGHLY recommend these speakers!!
customer_reviews.author: C. Alindog

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal. Great sound. Read Review.
customer_reviews.text: These are great speakers. I bought them explicitly to listen to vynil & CDs. After years of soundbars attached to my subwoofer, I totally forgot how real stereo sounded. Definitely worth the money. I was considering buying older speakers, but after some research I found that those would likely need to be 're foamed'. Last thing I need is another project, so I turned to these. Very powerful & I hear things in songs I never heard before.
customer_reviews.author: John M

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: I'm no speaker guru, and my hearing is not the best. These are the best speakers I have ever had. They are for a theater room, and I find myself in there listening to music often. We have gotten so used to earbuds and small bluetooth speakers, I think we have forgotten what nice(er) speakers sound like. I am so surprised how much better these sound than the bookshelf ones they replaced. I'm sure there are much nicer out there, but probably not in this price range.
customer_reviews.author: ChunkMaster

customer_reviews.title: These speaker are excellent, especially in this price range
customer_reviews.text: These speaker are excellent, especially in this price range. The treble sounds are crisp and clear, but not overly piercing like some brands, the mid range is good, and the base is acceptable considering the cone size. I have them paired with a subwoofer to supplement the base. As a comparison with my last Cerwin Vega, the mid-range and treble are far better to my ears and the base doesn't overpower. Right now I am awaiting my center speakers to round out my system. I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: andhum

customer_reviews.title: Music Music Music
customer_reviews.text: Pretty decent speakers ! No reason to pay attention to the negatives on these speakers. From looks to sound you will be super happy as long as your not trying to play the loudest music you can. They can get loud but they are not made for blazing loud music. These are put together as well as a solid performing fantastic sounding speaker can be for the cost. You will not be upset at all and make sure you bring yourself to purchase 14 ga speaker wire as well. It brings out the best in these speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Kukoc K.

customer_reviews.title: Great Sounding Speakers!
customer_reviews.text: I was in the market for some new tower speakers, but didn't want to spend an arm and a leg. These Onkyos really fill the room with a wonderful sound. They pair nicely with my Onkyo stereo receiver and are just what I needed. Glad I took a chance on them.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: These are real good speakers. Very clean design and very clean sound ...
customer_reviews.text: These are real good speakers. Very clean design and very clean sound with decent bass response (but decent bass response is no substitute for a sub-woofer). They can handle a boatload of power, so turn ‘em up.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Davis

customer_reviews.title: Replaced a set of Bose Tower Speakers - Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: These new Onkyo speakers were purchased to replace a 18 year old set of Bose Towers 10.2. The Onkyo sound better than the Bose and we are just hoping they will last just as long as the Bose. At 1/4 of the price of a pair of Bose Towers, these are a great value!! I would highly recommend these speakers especially for listening to old vinyls and watching movies in Dolby(tm) surround sound mode.
customer_reviews.author: Joel S.

customer_reviews.title: I am extremely pleased, they sound fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I use a pair of these speakers with a 100W per channel receiver in a 14' x 20' room, listening to all kinds of music.....rock, jazz, classical. I am extremely pleased, they sound fantastic, not too colored, firm but balanced bass response. And on top of that, they are a fantastic value!
customer_reviews.author: Peter Williams

customer_reviews.title: A great value for the price😁
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product, the sound is just perfect, I’m not the most tech savvy person, but I found it easy to get them started, I ordered a Bluetooth amplifier, works perfect with the speakers I can connect my phone to it women I want to listen to my music.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia B.

customer_reviews.title: I Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Guys... I Love these!!!!!!! You get a pair!!!!!!! Get a powerful receiver and your ears will blow before they will.
customer_reviews.author: Big Harvey

customer_reviews.title: These are really great speakers for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are really great speakers for the price. In my opinion they should still be used with a subwoofer, but I can see why some people say they have enough bass to get away with not using one. I'm a big fan of clear, natural sounding audio, and these worked great for my setup.
customer_reviews.author: AAAAAAHHHHH!!!

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Speakers
customer_reviews.text: Received the Speakers well packaged. They are heavy, but well worth the effort. I have placed the speakers as Front surround for 7.1 Onkyo System. The change from book shelf speakers was dynamic. The sound is great. I know the low Freq is only 55 but tied with a subwooffer, I can not ask for a better sound. If you are looking for a great speaker at a reasonable price, this is the speaker for you.
customer_reviews.author: Marvin L. Suthers

customer_reviews.title: Outdoor theater
customer_reviews.text: The sound is great. I use this for my outdoor theater setup, and they sound awesome. Price is great for what they offer
customer_reviews.author: gchumba

customer_reviews.title: For the money you will not find a speaker to match it!
customer_reviews.text: You can't buy a better speaker fo the money. I have a 5200 front 6 4800's for front and surround and 2 4900's for Atmos . All Onko blu Ray CD player EQ Dual 3 3head Cassette player and working on getting 2 different subs. They are excellent speakers for home theater or music. Hear drum rolls and other symbols I've never heard with other speakers. They Rock!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Really good sound for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace a pair of Onkyo floor standing speakers I bought in 1991. I am very happy with the sound. I use them with an Onkyo set of components also purchased back in 1991. They sound great - crisp treble, vocals sound awesome. Bass is good as well. I live in a townhome so I cannot really crank the volume anyway, but I really like the clean sound of these.
customer_reviews.author: AtoZGuy

customer_reviews.title: Great Speakers
customer_reviews.text: Had these for 5+ years now and they are still just as great as they were when they were purchased. They work perfect, albeit somewhat large for front L & R speakers, they double as my stereo speakers. These sit on the floor on either side of my wall mounted TV.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: slam bam thank you mam
customer_reviews.text: check the other reviews forr detail but i myself will bluntly say these speakers are worth their while. I played them as a 2 channel and they basically made my old setup look stupid. I've set them up for regular use as a 3.1 system. paired with my 10 inch sub and micca center channel these speakers are amazingly beautiful. looks and sounds great. heavier than i initially expected, but it's all good.
customer_reviews.author: Zx10

customer_reviews.title: Great Speakers
customer_reviews.text: Replaced some 30 year old Bose with these. They look elegant and have great sound.
customer_reviews.author: A4153

customer_reviews.title: Great sound for the price
customer_reviews.text: I have these set up with a couple other speakers with bigger drivers and the bass response in these are much deeper.
customer_reviews.author: lonman

customer_reviews.title: No complaints.
customer_reviews.text: These are not the big blasters of yesteryear but they do hold their own quite well. I round out the bottom end with a subwoofer. As with any speaker, placement is important. Two feet from the corner or wall is best for me.
customer_reviews.author: John D. in Michigan

customer_reviews.title: Great Speakers
customer_reviews.text: This is the first set of speakers I purchased in 30 years. They replaced an old set of EGOs. Paired with my Onkyo Integra A-8057 and components, these reall do the job. Bass and mid-range is better than I expected. Upper end may be a little weak compared to my old speakers, or could just be my hearing is not as sensitive as it once was. I highly recommend these, but seach the price, as it seems to vary a lot during the year
customer_reviews.author: Ziggy Stardust

customer_reviews.title: Nice sound
customer_reviews.text: These speakers work great for my renovated system so I can once again hear my vinyl collection with quality equipment and these speakers.
customer_reviews.author: William Crawford

customer_reviews.title: One speaker blew out in less than a year
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality but the right speaker blew out in less than a year. I am so frustrated with this.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to replace my front ONKYO speakers These things rock!.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This product work excellent and I would recommend it to others
customer_reviews.author: H. E. Galvin

customer_reviews.title: just know that the speakers sound better with a better receiver
customer_reviews.text: These speakers are incredible for the money, just know that the speakers sound better with a better receiver
customer_reviews.author: Chub78

customer_reviews.title: Awesome home theatre speakers
customer_reviews.text: Stop thinking and click purchase. I reviewed every speaker available on amazon for about 2 weeks and finally gave up and bought these. So glad I did. Im currently using these as my only speakers for my home theatre system and it's AWESOME! Fills up a 21x16 room with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Lorenza White

customer_reviews.title: Pair with Onkyo A-9010
customer_reviews.text: Pair these bad boys up with an Onkyo A-9010 and you will be blown away. By far the best speakers available at this price point. Just perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Your Standard Reject

customer_reviews.title: 130 watts of awsome power
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical at first to buy these but they sound great and I'm happy I did it
customer_reviews.author: Dan Marino

customer_reviews.title: great speakers
customer_reviews.text: sound great, full sound with nice highs and strong bass without a subwoofer. They're also sturdy and look nice on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Great sound at an Affordable Price!!
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding speakers. I Use to own Bose 401 speakers which I enjoyed for many years and these speakers matched up with the same crisp and realistic sound. I would recommend these speakers to anyone who wants great sound at an affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Very good speakers for Stereo music system. Clean full range sound, no need of sub-woofer.
customer_reviews.text: This speakers has enough base to be used in Stereo music system without sub woofer. Very goof clean overall sound. Good to use with turntable and good quality amplifier to create excellent music system.
customer_reviews.author: MelRay

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Deal
customer_reviews.text: Two quality tower speakers at an affordable price. If your looking for clear sound and good bass with a classy look, then look no further! I will be purchasing a second pair of these for the theater room upstairs
customer_reviews.author: Jorge A. Fierro

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for Money
customer_reviews.text: I replace 2 Bose Towers, im very happy, for price, it's one of better shot you can have, the médium are Solid y crispy sound
customer_reviews.author: Juan C.

customer_reviews.title: Fun to have both systems
customer_reviews.text: I have not had a stereo for the main living area in a while. We usually use our TV surround sound. The Onkyo Stereo and speakers are LOUD BOOMING. Fun to have both systems. One (Sansung) for vewing normal level movies and stuff. Then we rock the room with the Onkyo tuner and 6-disk changer stereo with speakers. GREAT value you will be happy
customer_reviews.author: patrick d deweese

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding sound / great value
customer_reviews.text: These sound from these speakers is outstanding. Not extremely loud, but they will fill a good sized room with clear, crisp sound.
customer_reviews.author: Montana Guy

customer_reviews.title: Great speakers !
customer_reviews.text: These speakers have great sound if you listen at low to moderate high sound levels. I have a pair of Polk monitor 5 speakers, and overall I prefer the Onkyo SKF-4800. The Polk speakers can bother your ears after extended listening. Too bright. Using a Onkyo 75 watt per channel stereo amplifier and a HSU Research 10 inch sub. I prefer to listen to movies in stereo, not surround sound.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money
customer_reviews.text: I don't regret, excellent speakers , better bass. No need for subs for music but needs to movies , they are good looking too. I am giving 5 stars since i own it for a year. Clarity is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Sandi S.

customer_reviews.title: Not So Great as Stand Alone Speakers
customer_reviews.text: Other reviews mentioned that although these speakers are intended to be part of a larger surround-sound arrangement of multiple speakers, they sounded great all by themselves. This is NOT the case. There is literally no low end to these things. They are clearly designed to work within a system that has a pre-amped subwoofer, as indicated in the user instructions that came with them. They really are just muddy mid-range speakers without much high end either. Without my equalizer to push the highs and lows, these would be completely unacceptable to anyone with any sense of tonal quality. I do not recommend them as stand-alone speakers.
customer_reviews.author: AJ123

customer_reviews.title: I also have the Polk TSi400 but like these even better
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of bass, clear mid range. I also have the Polk TSi400 but like these even better..
customer_reviews.author: GBK

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: These are way nicer than I expected.Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: raymond buzzinski

customer_reviews.title: Onkyo SKF 4800 front speakers
customer_reviews.text: Very nice sound, attractive speakers. A little "overkill" for the size of room I placed them in, but well worth the cost. Hoping they last as long as my previous Sony floor speakers.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The sound is better than expected, would recommend to friends.
customer_reviews.author: thomas c holmes

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker system
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound quality, at low to medium volume. Have not had a chance to max them out.
customer_reviews.author: BEEKLO

customer_reviews.title: I can't imagine you could do much better. Overall they sound great but the highs are ...
customer_reviews.text: I got mine on sale so for the money, I can't imagine you could do much better. Overall they sound great but the highs are weak, I ended up pairing them with a set of bookshelf speakers on top to open them up a bit but I would guess at this price they may not have an actual crossover. You can definitely get better but probably not without spending a lot more money.
customer_reviews.author: BigJake

customer_reviews.title: great speakers
customer_reviews.text: I selected these to go with my new Klipsch subwoofer. Replaced my old bose 501 (1984...a sweet year for 501's) set, these were a great price and sound fine. The sleek heavy speakers look good by my sound & entertainment systems, too. Very satisfied with these nice Onkyo speakers!
customer_reviews.author: JR Richards

customer_reviews.title: Great speakers
customer_reviews.text: Ok had them for a few months now and love them hooked them up as fronts in a 5.1 setup love the sound they give you i play a lot of multi channel sacds and they make all the difference in the world put it this way when i sit there and listen to music and the sound just puts a smile on my face its that good And by the way they crank too
customer_reviews.author: T. Clayton

customer_reviews.title: My ears are old but these sound MUCH Better than those little mini speakers that are included with ...
customer_reviews.text: My ears are old but these sound MUCH Better than those little mini speakers that are included with home theater systems. These are 2-ways with some base, so the woofer that came with my stereo is a good mate. Good Bang for your $$ on this pair.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: I combined this with a Yamaha stereo receiver and have the best system for home use
customer_reviews.text: Incredible sound. I combined this with a Yamaha stereo receiver and have the best system for home use. Bass, treble and mid-range are crystal clear. My brother has the Pioneers but these sound better.
customer_reviews.author: Jose M.

customer_reviews.title: "Elegant" sound
customer_reviews.text: If your objective is not to blow your windows out of their panes, and if you hate distortion (audiophile = distortiophobe) these Onkyos are for you. Coupled with a Yamaha stereo amp, you have the ultimate system for enjoying classical music. If you have a good input source, every sound in the orchestra is delightfully separate. No matter how much you ratchet them up - and don't think they are wimps by any means - they never sound overly loud. And they still deliver the goods at low volumes. I love 'em!
customer_reviews.author: Willeman

customer_reviews.title: great speakers
customer_reviews.text: Paired it with my old Tandberg receiver and the sound is amazing. What I have been listening all these years???? I love music but can't afford expensive hi-end equipment. So when Amazon offered these for $129 (on Prime) I grabbed it right away, and I am glad that I did.
customer_reviews.author: Vadim

customer_reviews.title: Very accurate reproduction of classical music
customer_reviews.text: Great sound separation enabling identification of individual instruments in all their nuances. Solid, authentic bass, including organ pedal notes. Converts my 18 x 26' room into a concert hall.
customer_reviews.author: Foxy

customer_reviews.title: Kick @$$
customer_reviews.text: These speakers rockkkkk!!!! They sound really crisp and has some really deep bass. I would recommend anyone who wants a quality set of speakers to purchase these babies!
customer_reviews.author: Cary G. Cranor

customer_reviews.title: Good spkrs
customer_reviews.text: Work fine, but keep in mind a good spkr won't improve a bad recording/production of music. You can sometimes find them at half the price, but they were always out when I checked.
customer_reviews.author: Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great filling sound
customer_reviews.text: Need two great R&L channel speaker that were standing. Great sound especially for the price. Wish the base was bigger because they can easily be pushed over.
customer_reviews.author: Dan I.

customer_reviews.title: I love these speakers
customer_reviews.text: I love these speakers. They are relatively cheap but they can compete with $500+ speakers. Highly recommend for a stereo pair or fronts of your sound system.
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: ireally enjoy this item an is everything that ibeen looking for ...

customer_reviews.title: for the price these are very nice sounding, well balanced speakers
customer_reviews.text: I've had my share of much higher-end speakers over the years. To these old ears and wallet, for the price these are very nice sounding, well balanced speakers.
customer_reviews.author: ChuloHock

customer_reviews.title: They sound great! Decent lows
customer_reviews.text: They sound great! Decent lows, good highs and very good mids. These replaced some cheap speakers from a HT in a box - it was a great purchase.

Take your old left and right and make those the back surrounds and crank it. You won't believe the difference. These may sound slightly louder too cause they are 6 ohm.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Quite a bargain for the excellent sound they reproduce. Be sure to set your receiver to "full band" for these.

customer_reviews.text: Best $200 I ever spent! Hooked up to my Onkyo receiver great sound at any volume...whole house shakes! Must buy if you want big sound at a lower price.

customer_reviews.text: What an improvement in sound quality for my vinyl collection over the bookshelf speakers I had! Easy set up. Very good!

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great speakers! These sound great with crisp highs, and mids. They are also relatively inexpensive. Just get a subwoofer and you are set.

customer_reviews.text: Very happy with product, price and delivery. speakers are used in my office/studio playing everything from Sting to Sex Pistols,,,Gabriel to Arcade Fire and Dr Feelgood to name a few,,,not a very technical review but hope it helps my fellow non technical vinyl lovers out there.....

customer_reviews.title: Whoop there it is
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality out of these speakers and definitely glad I went with these. Will probably get a subwoofer for movies and TV shows which have more deep base cinema like sound quality. Otherwise, these are great stand alone speakers for music.

customer_reviews.text: Ordered these to replace my 12 year old Onkyo Front Speakers. The old ones were running great, but they were 12 years old. The bass output is amazing, and they are crystal clear. So far, I love them!

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding
customer_reviews.text: Very nice speakers. They look good in my den and have extremely good sound. Being in my house, I haven't cranked them up to the max, but so far at half volume they are very clear. Typical Onkyo product. Nice!

customer_reviews.text: Nice looking. Very clean, crisp sound. Some other reviews say that a sub woofer isn't necessary, but as nice as the sound is, I will probably get one to round these speakers out a little better. Great buy though!

customer_reviews.title: awesome floor standing speaker's
customer_reviews.text: Sounds a whole lot better than the speaker they replaced very crisp and boomy now I'm looking at receivers and amplifiers center channels and surround speakers.

customer_reviews.title: Great sound !
customer_reviews.text: These sound great ! You can't beat it for the price.

customer_reviews.text: These things thump and sound wonderful in a 2.0 setup. A sub isn't really necessary. My only gripe is that the center and surrounds that match this pair are not available stateside.

customer_reviews.text: Cant believe the sound quality out of these towers for the money. Plus the shipping was extremely fast. Couldnt be happier

customer_reviews.text: Only have had a month, so far so good, awesome full sound, audiophile friends says sound is as good as his $800 polks.

customer_reviews.text: Outstanding speakers. A great improvement to my system and an incredible value.

customer_reviews.title: The speakers are a bit flat and have uninspiring sound ...
customer_reviews.text: The speakers are a bit flat and have uninspiring sound. For the money they are OK, but based on the reviews I was expecting much more. I never expected Onkyo to make such low end speakers. I am considering move them to be rear surround speakers.
customer_reviews.author: M. J. Sears

customer_reviews.title: Can't possibly see how these are worth $300 they are ...
customer_reviews.text: Can't possibly see how these are worth $300 they are not loud and they muffle. I hooked them up and now they are just sitting there not connected collecting dust what a waste
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Scissorhand

customer_reviews.title: New Onkyo speakers
customer_reviews.text: These speakers suck!!! I just hooked them up to replace my old Onkyo speakers and they sound like a transistor radio. I went to the web site and read the specs.......low frequency response is 55Hz. My old Onkyos delivered at 40 Hz. For those not familiar with response....normal hearing range is 20 to 20,000 HZ. If you truly want to feel the music, buy something with a lower frequency response. These speaker were a disappointment Don't buy these speaker unless you have a sub woofer in your system! I bought based on the reviews....wasted $270.00
customer_reviews.author: J. Covan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent speakers for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I missed the floor standing speakers I had when I was younger and kept blowing out the little surround sound ones I had. Bought these and don't regret it. I'm sure some big spending audiophile could find a problem with them but I think they sound great for the price range.
customer_reviews.author: B Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality.
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking;; easy hook up. Good sound quality. Fits well into space. Replaces older damaged speakers used for TV and music equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Onkyo SKF-4800 2-Way Bass Reflex Floor-standing Speakers (Pair)
product_meta.description: These specially crafted speakers will bring energy and full-spectrum power to your home entertainment. The stylish floor-standing front speakers can be used to complement a stereo system perfectly, or to build up a surround sound system by using these as Front Left and Right channels. Their twin woofers give them the heft to handle dynamic classical scores and towering rock anthems with equal aplomb. At all volume levels, your music will sound full and natural, with stunning detail across the audio spectrum.
